mapper.sql: sku_id, title, sell_point, price, stock_count, barcode, image, categoryId, status, create_time, update_time, cost_pirce, market_price, is_default, product_id, category, brand, spec

select
distinct
from sku
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into sku (sku_id, title, sell_point, price, stock_count, barcode, image, categoryId, status, create_time, update_time, cost_pirce, market_price, is_default, product_id, category, brand, spec ) values (#{skuId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sellPoint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{price,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stockCount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{barcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{categoryid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{costPirce,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{marketPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{isDefault,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{brand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spec,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
